In the vicinity of the small town of Raccoon City has recently started to happen heinous murder.
In the police reports indicated that the attacks were carried out in groups of about 10 people, as well as if the victims were eaten.

In spite of the developments in Arkleyskom forest corporation "Umbrella" does not ceased to operate.
The surviving members of STARS vainly tried to warn authorities about the horrific experiments corporation, but they still did not believe.
Soon the whole city was engulfed by a virus that is spread throughout the city sewer rats.
Resident Evil 2 takes us directly into the midst of these terrible events.
Arriving in the city for reasons of their own, Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield, will unite to survive in the struggle against the crowds walking dead, and other monsters.

DESCRIPTION:
Since the destruction of Raccoon City has been almost 6 years.
Leon now works in the Secret Service of the President of the United States, and is assigned to find and rescue the president's daughter - Ashley Graham - who was kidnapped under strange circumstances.
Leon is sent to the countryside in the south of Spain, where, according to intelligence breaks trace the kidnappers.
But instead of a detective investigation, Leon waiting for a real war.
At him for no reason start attacking the locals accompanying police officers killed ...
As events unfold the hero learns that the cause of the aggressive behavior of inhabitants is a parasitic life form called - Las Plagas, which has long lived in the form of spores, in Rudnikova mines.

Chris Redfield, known to us from previous installments Resident Evil, filled desire to destroy all traces of the corporation "Umbrella", which has dozens of years of developing biological weapons.
Although all attempts to create an army invulnerable monsters were unsuccessful, mad scientists corporations continue to experiment on human beings.

Chris goes to a small African village, where hundreds of people are all signs of experimental virus infection.
They changed both externally and internally and now attack anything that moves.
The virus has created a perfect killers, strong and durable.
Chris and his companion Sheva Alomar will have to face serious opponents, which resemble little brainless creatures from the previous parts.

September 1998.
The ill-fated town of Raccoon City is going through the terrible consequences of contracting deadly T-virus, which was created in the laboratory of Umbrella Corporation and released into the city water supply system.
To hide the crime, Umbrella sends an elite squad of mercenaries to destroy the evidence to prove her involvement in what is going on and, of course, all the witnesses.
Hearing of this plan, the U.S. government, in turn, sends out in Raccoon City Special Forces unit in order to get evidence of viral infection and the spread of culpability in this Umbrella ...

DESCRIPTION:
Resident Evil 6 combines dynamic action and the tense atmosphere of the genre of survival horror.
You have to see again with familiar characters - Leon Kennedy and Chris Redfield, as well as meet with newcomers, including, for example, Jake Mueller.
As you progress through the story you will visit North America, East European country and the Chinese province of Edon Lanshyan.
We offer three separate, but closely intertwined stories.
In each of them the main characters, and each implies the possibility of playing together - both on the network and one for the console.
Leon Kennedy will make the company the U.S. government agent Helena Harper.
Chris Redfield join forces with the employee BSAA Pierce Nivensom, and the son of the famous Albert Ueskera, mercenary Jake Muller, daughter enlist the support of leading scientists, "Umbrella," William and Annette Birkin - Sherry.
